For example: did you know that your black magic summons can be sacrificed to recycle the mana cost?
For example: do you think when a spell ends, the mana vanishes? It doesn't. It spreads out across the ether, allowing regeneration.
For example: anyone can cast any spell. The reason people don't cast any spell they want is all a matter of psychology.
For example: it's possible to use your HP instead of mana to cast spells. Though, you really shouldn't try, for obvious reasons.
For example: white magic isn't quite like other magic types. Healing spells convert mana into HP, and cures merely dissipate spells.
